name: PURA MENTE MEDITATION, INC.
description: Developer of a wellness application designed to learn how to meditate and maintain a healthy life balance. The company's platform teaches how to meditate as well as offers free guided sessions, and intermediate and advanced courses, and also offers company-based plans for employees, enabling corporate clients and users to reduce stress levels, and anxiety and increase productivity.
